dict.acceptation: “myself”的复数；我们自己；（把）我们自己；

sent.orig: When we accept ourselves and rely on ourselves, we feel good ourselves.
sent.trans: 当我们接受自己、依赖自己的时候，我们自我感觉良好。

sent.orig: We also proud of ourselves because we did everything by ourselves.
sent.trans: 我们也骄傲，因为做任何事，我们都是靠我们自己。

sent.orig: We would rather speak ill of ourselves than not talk about ourselves at all.
sent.trans: 我们宁愿说自己的坏话，也不愿意完全不谈论自己。

sent.orig: We Americans have faith in ourselves, but not in ourselves alone.
sent.trans: 我们美国人民相信我们自己──但不只是相信我们自己。

sent.orig: The good life is constantly challenge ourselves, beyond ourselves.
sent.trans: 生命的精彩在于不断地挑战自己，超越自己。
